steps.name: $("By.xpath: //a[@href='/' and contains(@style, 'orange')]") should have(attribute style="color: orange;")
$("By.xpath: //button[@class='btn btn-default cart']") should not have([attribute disabled, 30 s.])
$("By.xpath: //button[@class='btn btn-default cart']") should be([clickable: interactable and enabled, 30 s.])
$("By.xpath: //a[@href='/view_cart']/u[text()='View Cart']") should not have([attribute disabled, 30 s.])
$("By.xpath: //a[@href='/view_cart']/u[text()='View Cart']") should be([clickable: interactable and enabled, 30 s.])
